t: History of Amazon - Wikipedia
s: April 20, 2025 - It has been referred to as "one ... valuable brands. Amazon was founded by Jeff Bezos from his garage in Bellevue, Washington, on July 5, 1994. Initially an online marketplace for books, it has expanded into a multitude of product categories: a strategy that has earned it the moniker "the everything store".
